version_description:
Jump into paradise blue and experience the ultimate 3D fishing adventure!

- New Australia Fishing Spots
- You can now complete your Fish Books with Grade A or higher to unlock the next Fishing Spots.
- You can now Superboost up to Lv. 600.
- New Individual Buffs
- New Package Items
- You can now appoint a new Guild Leader if the previous Guild Leader hasn't logged in for a long time.
- Minor UI modifications

Got feedback? Leave a review or visit http://www.withhive.com/help/inquire and drop us a line!

Jump into paradise blue and experience the ultimate 3D fishing adventure!

Jump into paradise blue seas and experience the ultimate 3D fishing adventure!

1. Relay Fishing is now available in Australia.
2. New Secret Fishing Spot and Hidden Fish added in Yangtze River.
3. New Guild Battle Titles are now available.
4. It's now much easier to search and recruit new Guild Members.
5. The rewards you receive when the Guild Battles end in a draw will be increased.
6. Minor UI improvements.

Got feedback? Leave a review or visit http://www.withhive.com/help/inquire and drop us a line!

Jump into paradise blue seas and experience the ultimate 3D fishing adventure!

- New Nile River Area
- New Australia Tournament and Secret Fishing Spots
- New Australian Hidden Fish
- The MAX Accessory level has been increased to Lv. 900
- The Hawaii Area is no longer available in the Guild Battle
- The quests in Hawaii have been modified.
- You can now view the Guild Chat Time.
- You can now view the time you sent Energy to your friends.
- Main Page Renewal
- UI Improvements
